name: Giskard in the dark
description:
Giskard is a Robot lost between Universes. He wants to return where the humans are, to protect Them. Help Giskard to open Portals who drive to universes where the physics es relative. 

Collect Gems, and open Portals. Find Mirror Giskards, and use them to achieve your Goal. Go through magic walls. Avoid the elastic walls, and never never fall out. 

Giskard in the darkl is an easy but sometimes disturbing 2D platform game based in the Space. With a calm music and a simple Pixel Art mixed with some 3d elements like the amazing planets, stars and comets. Take your time to found all the gems in the universes, you have no time to finish, and no enemies following you. But Giskard isn't and easy Game, you must remember the map of each level, and the difficulty is increasing between levels.
